MaterialPlane.Sett.MovementMethod_Hint: Sets the movement and vision method. 'Default' is the default Foundry behavior (vision updates after move), 'Live' updates the vision while moving, 'Step-by-Step' moves the token onto every grid you drag along, updating the vision every step
MaterialPlane.Sett.Deselect_Hint: Deselect the token when it is no longer dragged
MaterialPlane.Sett.NonownedMovement_Hint: Enable the movement of non-owned tokens
MaterialPlane.Sett.TargetName_Hint: Name of the player who has the TV connected
MaterialPlane.Sett.HideDisplay_Hint: Hides all display elements for the target player (if not GM). Client can click 'Ctrl' to toggle the elements
MaterialPlane.Sett.SensorIP_Hint: Fill in the IP address of the sensor module
MaterialPlane.Sett.MovementMarker_Hint: During token movement, draw a marker to indicate where the token will move moved to on token drop
MaterialPlane.Sett.hwVariant_Hint: Select the sensor hardware that you use
MaterialPlane.BaseSetup.Title: IR Base Setup
MaterialPlane.BaseSetup.Main.Description: In this screen you can link IR bases with tokens and actors.
MaterialPlane.BaseSetup.BaseId.Label: Base Id
MaterialPlane.BaseSetup.TokenName.Label: Token Name
MaterialPlane.BaseSetup.TokenName.Descri: Name of the token to link to (only required if 'Link Actor' is not checked)
MaterialPlane.BaseSetup.TokenScene.Label: Token Scene
MaterialPlane.BaseSetup.TokenScene.Descr: Name of the scene of the token (only required if 'Link Actor' is not checked)
MaterialPlane.BaseSetup.ActorName.Label: Actor Name
MaterialPlane.BaseSetup.ActorName.Descri: Name of the actor to link to (only required if 'Link Actor' is checked
MaterialPlane.BaseSetup.LinkActor.Label: Link Actor
MaterialPlane.BaseSetup.LinkActor.Descri: Link the base to a specific actor, regardless of scene or token name
MaterialPlane.BaseSetup.Id.Label: Id
MaterialPlane.BaseSetup.Id.Description: Copy the most recent base ID to 'Base Id'
MaterialPlane.BaseSetup.Data.Label: Data
MaterialPlane.BaseSetup.Data.Description: Copy the token name, scene name and actor name from the most recent data
MaterialPlane.BaseSetup.Delete.Label: Delete
MaterialPlane.BaseSetup.PlusButton.Label: + button
MaterialPlane.CalDialog.Singlepoint2: Please calibrate each corner of you screen.
MaterialPlane.CalDialog.Multipoint2: Please switch on the corner LEDs.
MaterialPlane.CalDialog.Offset2: Please calibrate each corner of you screen.
MaterialPlane.CalDialog.Title: Calibrating
MaterialPlane.CalSett.Title: Calibration Menu
